traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. he never insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around him. he also never judges people by their appearance.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, he will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if his mood is low.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. he learns much slower than others.
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: bodymodder

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. he strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Timmy is absolutely gorgeous. Even at first glance, people fall in love with the sight of him. However, this overwhelming beauty may allow jealousy and envy to overcome him. Since they hate ruining their look, they can't take much of a beating before breaking down.
traits.name: gorgeous

traits.description: Timmy is absolutely hideous. his face resembles a melted blobfish which got crushed by a meat tenderizer. Most others would rather sniff cow dung within 5 centimeters of it than look at him. The harsh amount of hate they've received over the years has hardened their emotions, and made them tougher.
traits.name: hideous

traits.description: Timmy easily completes any task they are assigned to at an efficient rate but seems to learn skills a lot slower compared to others.
traits.name: hyperfocused

traits.description: Timmy has trouble completing any task they are assigned and will take significantly longer to do so, however, learns at a quicker rate than most others.
traits.name: lethargic

traits.description: Timmy is a speed demon. They move at an extremely fast pace and leaves everyone else in the dust.
traits.name: sprinter

traits.description: Timmy is a marksman, hitting most shots with ease. They rarely miss, but take quite an extended amount of time to aim their shots.
traits.name: deadeye

traits.description: Timmy is as trigger happy as it can get. Whilst they can fire at incredible rates, they don't seem to hit many of their shots.
traits.name: gun-ho

traits.description: Timmy is a natural ranged fighter. They love using ranged weaponry and are skilled in doing so. However, they will be unhappy if holding a melee weapon.
traits.name: archer

traits.description: Timmy adores explosions. They love handling bombs, molotovs, and similar explosives. However, if they are told to carry a different weapon, they will be very upset.
traits.name: demolitionsexpert

traits.description: Timmy has an unnatural ability to extract precious minerals from ores. They will dig up more yield from every ore but at a slower rate.
traits.name: skilledextractor

traits.description: Timmy knows where to mine to get the most ore. They will dig up more yield from every ore but at a slower rate.
traits.name: extractor

traits.description: Timmy is a speedy, albeit rough miner. They will break ores and stone quicker, but ore gets lost in the process.
traits.name: clumsyminer

traits.description: Timmy is very impatient when it comes to mining. They will break ores and stone much quicker, but more ore gets lost in the process.
traits.name: impatientminer

traits.description: Timmy is absolutely terrified of explosive weapons. If they are holding an explosive weapon, it will drive them mad with fright.
traits.name: ekrixiphobia

traits.description: Timmy is a natural plant worker. They know their way around gardens and farms alike. Taking their time, they can yield a lot more produce out of plants.
traits.name: greentouch

traits.description: While they have the right intentions, Timmy just isn't the great farmer they think they are. They speed through planting and harvesting much quicker than others, but leave behind a lot of produce.
traits.name: browntouch

traits.description: Timmy has everything together most of the time and uses that ability to work much faster.
traits.name: veryorganized

traits.description: Timmy is usually organized when it comes to working, and will work a little faster than others.
traits.name: organized

traits.description: Timmy loses focus and tools often which leads to their disorganization. They will take longer to finish their tasks.
traits.name: disorganized

traits.description: Timmy can barely keep their eyes on their task, and loses the tools for their work relatively often. This leads to a large decrease in productivity.
traits.name: verydisorganized

traits.description: Timmy knows how to prepare food properly, and has a significantly decreased chance of creating poisoned meals regardless of cooking area.
traits.name: naturalcook

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for cutting in the right areas. If they are assigned to butcher any creature, they will do it with precision.
traits.name: masterbutcher

traits.description: Timmy isn't a rookie to butchering meat and can save more flesh while butchering.
traits.name: butcher

traits.description: Timmy has very shaky hands, and can't butcher meat very easily without guidance.
traits.name: shakyhands

traits.description: Timmy can't butcher meat without messing something up, and wastes a lot of valuable flesh.
traits.name: imprecisebutcher

traits.description: Timmy is a grease monkey. It's almost as if they were born to handle metal and electronics with ease.
traits.name: greasemonkey

traits.description: Timmy isn't a newbie to disassembling robots. They are a natural at breaking down old junk.
traits.name: mechanic

traits.description: Timmy is very faulty when it comes to disassembling robots. They'll waste precious resources when butchering mechanoids.
traits.name: faultymechanic

traits.description: Timmy can't butcher mechanoids without messing something up, and wastes a lot of valuable resources.
traits.name: unskilledmechanic

traits.description: Timmy is very stealthy and has a much easier time keeping in the shadows while hunting.
traits.name: verystealthy

traits.description: Timmy is a stealthy individual, who can sneak around wildlife easier than others can.
traits.name: stealthy

traits.description: Timmy is a professional medic. They can patch wounds that would normally kill others at surprising rates.
traits.name: professionalmedic

traits.description: Timmy is a doctor. They'll fix up any scratches or bruises faster than normal.
traits.name: doctor

traits.description: Timmy has a hard time applying the right treatment to patients, and thus is slower at tending.
traits.name: unskilleddoctor

traits.description: Timmy can barely wrap a bandage around their own arm, let alone anyone elses.
traits.name: terriblemedic

traits.description: Timmy is a master surgeon. Bionics, replacement parts, organ transplants, whatever needs done will be done.
traits.name: mastersurgeon

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled surgeon. They'll do surgery jobs a lot quicker than others.
traits.name: skilledsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy has a hard time cutting into human flesh to replace or add parts, it almost makes them sick.
traits.name: unskilledsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy can barely pick up a scalpel to even start a surgery job, and has a hard time using the tools.
traits.name: terriblesurgeon

traits.description: Timmy has a strong back which allows him to carry more than most people.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back, he must be part mule or something because he can carry a lot more than most people.
traits.name: verystrongback

traits.description: Timmy has a charismatic personality. he is good at social interactions and trading.
traits.name: charismatic

traits.description: Timmy has a very charismatic personality. he is great at social interactions and trading.
traits.name: verycharismatic

traits.description: Timmy has an intimidating personality, this gives him an advantage in social interactions.
traits.name: intimidating

traits.description: Timmy has a very intimidating personality, this gives him a large advantage in social interactions.
traits.name: veryintimidating

traits.description: Timmy has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss his target more often in combat.
traits.name: pooraim

traits.description: Timmy has good hand-eye coordination and will miss his target less often in combat.
traits.name: steadyaim

traits.description: Timmy has great hand-eye coordination and will miss his target less often in combat.
traits.name: greataim

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled crafter with artistic finesse, he enjoys putting things together and he's pretty good at it.
traits.name: artisan

traits.description: Timmy has an iron stomach. he can go without eating longer and it takes more to upset his stomach.
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy packs lightly. he will carry less but will move more swiftly.
traits.name: packin'light

traits.description: Timmy is a pack rat, he will keep just about anything that might be useful later.
traits.name: packrat

traits.description: Timmy has good reflexes and moves with finesse. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: agile

traits.description: Timmy has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: ninja

traits.description: Timmy is more intelligent than average. he learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around him.
traits.name: intelligent

traits.description: Timmy is very intelligent. he learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around him.
traits.name: veryintelligent

traits.description: Timmy is aware of his surroundings and has a good understanding of how his actions affects others.
traits.name: perceptive

traits.description: Timmy is very aware of his surroundings and has a great understanding of how his actions affects others.
traits.name: veryperceptive

traits.description: Timmy is good at doging things. he is good at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
traits.name: dodgy

traits.description: Timmy is great at evading things. he is great at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
traits.name: evasive

traits.description: Timmy is great at traveling. he moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: traveler

traits.description: Timmy is great at exploration. he moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: explorer

traits.description: Timmy is great at adventuring. he moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: adventurer

traits.description: Timmy is a bandolier. he likes to keep extra ammo handy for reloading ranged weapons.
traits.name: bandolier

traits.description: Timmy has a scientific mind. he is a good researcher and a fast learner.
traits.name: scientific

traits.description: Timmy has a very scientific mind. he is a great researcher and a fast learner.
traits.name: veryscientific

traits.description: Timmy has good health and an enduring personality. he is better at handling stressful situations than others.
traits.name: enduring

traits.description: Timmy has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. he is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.
traits.name: veryenduring

traits.description: Timmy is great at bargaining. he is great at social interactions and can find great deals while trading.
traits.name: bargainer

traits.description: Timmy is a hard bargainer. he is adept at social interactions and can find the best deals while trading.
traits.name: hardbargainer

traits.description: Timmy has an uninspiring personality. he has less motivation to learn and puts less effort into social interactions.
traits.name: uninspiring

traits.description: Timmy has an inspirational personality. he is good at social interactions and is a motivated learner .
traits.name: inspirational

traits.description: Timmy has a very inspirational personality. he is great at social interactions and is a very motivated learner.
traits.name: veryinspirational

traits.description: Timmy is a generous person, sometimes to a fault. he is a good negotiator but often does so by offering more than he should.
traits.name: generous

traits.description: Timmy is an overly generous person to a fault. he is a great negotiator but often does so by offering more than he should
traits.name: overlygenerous

traits.description: Timmy is good at working with scrap metal. he is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.
traits.name: scrapper

traits.description: Timmy is a natural leader, he is good at social interactions and can handle stressful situations that others might not.
traits.name: naturalleader

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radresistant

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a tolerance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radtolerant

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actionboy

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actiongirl

traits.description: Timmy has quick hands. When it comes to his hands, Timmy never hesitates.
traits.name: quickhands

traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, he loves guns so much that he gets a mood boost while holding a ranged weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly, but if you think that's fast wait until you see he eat!
traits.name: scrounger

traits.description: Timmy has a sturdy frame. he can carry more and it takes more to bring him down.
traits.name: sturdyframe

traits.description: Timmy is survialist. he has a natural ability to survive some situations that others might not.
traits.name: survivalist

traits.description: Timmy finds the gap to make the tackle! he moves quickly and gets the jobs done before anyone can react.
traits.name: blitz

traits.description: Timmy is a philanthropist. he is generally good natured and cares for the welfare of others.
traits.name: philanthropist

traits.description: Timmy has healing hands. Whether it's for patching up or food the colony knows they can count on his healing touch.
traits.name: healinghands

traits.description: Timmy is part tree! It takes more to bring Timmy down but also more to get him moving.
traits.name: rooted

traits.description: Timmy has a lead belly. his belly can go much longer without food and he is more resistant to toxic radiation.
traits.name: leadbelly

traits.description: Timmy has bear arms. he can carry more and his arms pack more of a punch!
traits.name: beararms

traits.description: Timmy is serendipitous, he seems to be a pretty lucky individual and he's pretty happy about it too.
traits.name: serendipitous

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for gardening. he is quick when working with plants and recieves more bountiful yields when harvesting them.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy is a tenderizer! he has a passion for beating meat into submission.
traits.name: tenderizer

traits.description: Timmy seems to discover hidden wealth where ever he goes.
traits.name: fortunefinder

traits.description: Timmy is a bountiful butcher! he isn't afraid to dig a little deeper to get what he wants.
traits.name: bountifulbutcher

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for animals. he is adept at animal interactions and will bond with them more often. Timmy refuses to hunt animals.
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description: Timmy has a magnetic body, literally! Somehow he able to use his attractiveness on not just colonists, but metals too!.
traits.name: magnetic

traits.description: Timmy embodies wellness! Colonist who need treatment can rest easily knowing they have his's expertise keeping them alive.
traits.name: lifegiver

traits.description: Timmy is a spiritual healer, he is a great doctor with good social skills. Timmy loves to grow and make his own medicine.
traits.name: spiritualhealer

traits.description: Timmy has a frail back and won't be able to carry as much as the average person.
traits.name: frailback

traits.description: Timmy is still human, mostly. he is immune to the effects of toxic fallout and much harder to kill but his ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
traits.name: ghoulish

traits.description: Timmy isn't stupid! he is just... different. he works through tasks slowly but learns extremely quickly. he is incapable performing intellectual, social or caring tasks.
traits.name: idiotsavant

traits.description: Timmy isn't very smart. he can mess up doing just about anything.
traits.name: stupid

traits.description: Timmy isn't very aware of his surroundings, or anything at all really. he
traits.name: oblivious

traits.description: Timmy is part woodchuck! he wants everyone to think his great woodworking skills are because of talent but everybody knows it's really because of those dang teeth.
traits.name: woodchucker

traits.description: Timmy is a wrecking ball! he can push through building material like it's not even there. he really doesn't know his own strength, often breaking things during construction.
traits.name: wreckingball

traits.description: Timmy is a perfectionist with a passion for art. he is great at construction but takes longer to complete tasks because he puts too much effort into making everything perfect.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: Timmy has an iron fist! he can punch through foes like they are not even there. Timmy has a passion for melee combat and dislikes ranged weapons.
traits.name: ironfist

traits.description: Timmy finds it difficult to focus on distant targets, and prefer to get up close and personal.
traits.name: nearsighted

traits.description: Timmy could spot a target from nearly a hundred meters, yet still somehow walk into walls.
traits.name: farsighted

traits.description: Timmy's movements are smooth and graceful.
traits.name: athletic

traits.description: Timmy is so rigid, it's almost like he is souless.
traits.name: stiff

traits.description: Timmy takes care of his personal hygiene.
traits.name: goodhygiene

traits.description: Timmy doesn't care about his hygiene, and sometimes get sick from bad food.
traits.name: poorhygiene

traits.description: Timmy often gets his way with things.
traits.name: persuasive

traits.description: Timmy has never won a debate in his life.
traits.name: unconvincing

traits.description: Timmy has been in plenty of fights since he was a kid, and had built up a tolerance to injury and pain as a result.
traits.name: resilient

traits.description: Timmy lived a pampered life until now, and is unused to the brutal challenges present out in the Rim.
traits.name: fragile

traits.description: Timmy always tackle his tasks with great enthusism.
traits.name: energetic

traits.description: Timmy is slow. Sooo... slooow...
traits.name: sluggish

traits.description: Timmy always sleep like a baby.
traits.name: restful

traits.description: Timmy often has a difficult time falling asleep.
traits.name: restless

traits.description: Timmy is quite productive when it comes to work.
traits.name: efficient

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat of a bottleneck in the colony.
traits.name: inefficient

traits.description: Timmy is brave, he would stand his where others would scramble and run.
traits.name: valiant

traits.description: When there's a fight, Timmy is the first to run.
traits.name: craven

traits.description: Timmy likes a good fight, he will sometimes start a fight just because he can.
traits.name: rowdy

traits.description: Timmy is usually calm and collected.
traits.name: composed

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in hot environment than his peers.
traits.name: heattolerant

traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the heat.
traits.name: heatintolerant

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in cold environment than his peers.
traits.name: coldtolerant

traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the cold.
traits.name: coldintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has a well built body, people around he find that rather attractive.
traits.name: muscular

traits.description: Timmy looks a bit fragile, but not in a lovable way.
traits.name: frail

traits.description: Timmy doesn't eat or drink much.
traits.name: abstinent

traits.description: Timmy has a bottomless pit for a stomach.
traits.name: ravenous

traits.description: Timmy is naturally talented, he gets a headstart before everyone else.
traits.name: gifted

traits.description: Timmy is someone everyone loves to hate.
traits.name: incompetent

traits.description: Timmy takes great care in the preparation of food, he never skip a step just to have an early meal.
traits.name: patientcook

traits.description: Timmy couldn't care less about following the recipes as long as he can get food into his mouth in record time.
traits.name: impatientcook

traits.description: Timmy lives a healthy lifestyle, and wakes up feeling energetic and cheerful.
traits.name: healthy

traits.description: Timmy gets ill quite often, and seem to require more effort to get out of bed than the average person.
traits.name: chronicallyill

traits.description: Timmy is comfortable in all seasons.
traits.name: temperaturetolerant

traits.description: Timmy thinks that summer is way too hot, and winter is way too cold.
traits.name: temperatureintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has good reaction time and finds physical activities less stressful than his peers.
traits.name: coordinated

traits.description: Timmy is easily distracted and often mess up when it comes to physical activities.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy is what people refer to as a 'stronk boi'.
traits.name: hardy

traits.description: Timmy is so fragile, it doesn't take much to take him out of action.
traits.name: feeble

traits.description: Whether by sheer optimism or a force of personality, Timmy always manages to see the bright side of life.
traits.name: easilyamused

traits.description: Life to Timmy is an endless, boring joke that he just can't get away from.
traits.name: constantlybemused

traits.description: Timmy has an interest in understanding the workings of the world, and is able to apply his knowledge in daily life.
traits.name: inquisitive

traits.description: Gaps in Timmy's education and general lack of curiosity makes life often stressful for him.
traits.name: ignorant

traits.description: Timmy is naturally good at shooting things from afar. he can fight in close combat, but would prefer not to.
traits.name: talent:bowman

traits.description: Timmy is handy with a sword. he has some skills with a bow, but prefers to fight up close and personal.
traits.name: talent:swordsman

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled builder. he knows how to build all sorts of buildings and furnitures.
traits.name: talent:builder

traits.description: Timmy spends a lot of time examining rocks. he is rather good at spotting valuable minerals.
traits.name: talent:miner

traits.description: Timmy likes to watch others cook.
traits.name: talent:kitchenhand

traits.description: Timmy likes to chop meat into chunks, preferably animal meat...
traits.name: talent:butcher

traits.description: Timmy likes to watch things grow.
traits.name: talent:farmer

traits.description: Timmy likes to raise animals and be in their presence.
traits.name: talent:herder

traits.description: Timmy likes the sound the forge makes. Ding! Ding! Ding!
traits.name: talent:smith

traits.description: Timmy thinks it would be nice if everyone could just stop running around with no clothes on.
traits.name: talent:tailor

traits.description: Maybe it's art, or maybe Timmy tripped over a bucket of paint. Again.
traits.name: talent:artist

traits.description: Timmy came to the realisation one day that he could stare at naked bodies with a valid excuse.
traits.name: talent:physician

traits.description: Timmy is a good negotiator, so good that he starts to make money off it.
traits.name: talent:trader

traits.description: Timmy has a thirst for knowledge.
traits.name: talent:scholar

traits.description: Timmy spends his time keeping everything neat and tidy.
traits.name: talent:groundskeeper

traits.description: Timmy isn't particularly good at anything, except at what everyone else does.
traits.name: talent:copycat

traits.description: Timmy is excellent at wielding all weapons. he could even kill using his little finger.
traits.name: talent:weaponsmaster

traits.description: Timmy is skilled at interacting with and hunting animals. Although not trained for battle, he could put up a good fight if needed.
traits.name: talent:hunter

traits.description: Timmy is an expert at building things. Very few construction works are a challenge to he.
traits.name: talent:engineer

traits.description: Timmy loves making food. Mmmmm...
traits.name: talent:cook

traits.description: Timmy has a wide range of botanical knowledge and decent medical skills.
traits.name: talent:herbalist

traits.description: Timmy considers it a sacred duty to produce the highest quality weapons and apparels possible to contribute to the defense of his homeland.
traits.name: talent:armourer

traits.description: Timmy is adept at archery, but unlike many others he is also relatively competent in craftsmanship.
traits.name: talent:fletcher

traits.description: Timmy loves working with and caring for animals, he could never leave an injured animal to die.
traits.name: talent:veterinarian

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled fighter. he realised that he could protect his friends and satisfy his curiosity at the same time.
traits.name: talent:adventurer

traits.description: Timmy is an architect. he understands that you don't have to be in The Good Place to build The Good Place.
traits.name: talent:architect

traits.description: Cooking is an art, or so Timmy says.
traits.name: talent:chef

traits.description: Timmy took it one step further, realising that he could get paid touching people's naked bodies.
traits.name: talent:surgeon

traits.description: Everyone hates moral philosophy professors, but Timmy certainly isn't one.
traits.name: talent:philosopher

traits.description: Timmy is an expert at scouting out new locations. he frequently leave the relative safety of the colony to patrol the wilderness.
traits.name: talent:scout

traits.description: Timmy is very pursuasive. he finds it relatively easy to rally people under he banner.
traits.name: talent:recruiter

traits.description: Timmy doesn't really standout, and he doesn't find anything particularly difficult.
traits.name: talent:jack-of-all-trades

traits.description: As long as Timmy still draws breath, there isn't one threat that the colony can't overcome!
traits.name: talent:hero

traits.description: A tongue as sharp as a blade with a sword arm to match, Timmy represents his faction's best interest and will gladly defend its name.
traits.name: talent:herald

traits.description: Timmy has no talent. None whatsoever
traits.name: notalent

traits.description: Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description: Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: Timmy is entombed in a warcasket. No amount of pain will have an effect on them, and they can never go into a pain shock or drop unconscious due to pain. Because of how bulky the armor is and how much energy it takes to use it, Timmy is not capable of doing any work.
traits.name: warcasket

traits.description: Timmy was entombed in a warcasket, and then brutally pulled out of one. The neural and nerve damage from being unplugged is so severe that Timmy is in constant, agonizing pain and can barely assemble his thoughts. Only installing Timmy back in a warcasket can cure the symptoms.
traits.name: shellcasket

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. he will prefer fishing above other activities.
traits.name: fisherman

traits.description: Timmy has Solid exoskeleton, he takes much less damage than other Anties from the same blows.
traits.name: solidexoskeleton

traits.description: Timmy is obsessed with germs and will wash much more frequently than normal.
traits.name: germaphobe

traits.description: Timmy is very hygienic and will wash more frequently.
traits.name: hygienic

traits.description: Timmy is very unhygienic and will wash less frequently.
traits.name: unhygienic

traits.description: Timmy has very low standards of cleanliness and will only wash when they absolutely have to.
traits.name: slob

traits.description: A Giants with giantism is said to grow up to 30 feet. Not only his heights, but his skin grows thicker. To compensate for such growth, Timmy must eat more.
traits.name: giantism

traits.description: Timmy was titled a great warrior after striking down a dangerous beast single-handedly.
traits.name: monsterhunter

traits.description: Timmy tends to occasionally allow their mind to drift, even in the middle of working.
traits.name: absent-minded

traits.description: Timmy has a loose screw or two, a small trade off for being naturally scientifically inclined.
traits.name: eccentric

traits.description: Timmy strives for perfection in his work. They will naturally produce better quality products at the expense of time. However, making a low quality product will upset them. Additionally, they may very rarely quit a project mid attempt if they don't like the direction its going in.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: While fully capable of warfare in theory, Timmy's fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and he will try to hide or run as a first priority.
traits.name: coward

traits.description: Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.
traits.name: brave

traits.description: Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy all too often, mostly due to uncoordinated tripping or falling.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy loves the brightness and heat of a dry summer day. They don't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in the warmth either.
traits.name: heatinclined

traits.description: Timmy loves the overcast and cold of a brisk winter night. They don't mind getting chilly or sleeping in the cold either.
traits.name: coldinclined

traits.description: A bomb could go off next to Timmy while they sleep and they'd continue to do so. They can't be bothered to defend the colony mid catnap, either.
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description: Timmy is naturally hygenic and organized. They will not track in dirt or throw trash anywhere, and feel happy while cleaning.
traits.name: neat

traits.description: Timmy is sloppy naturally and leaves trash and dirt everywhere it seems. At least they're not much bothered by messes.
traits.name: slob

traits.description: Timmy has problems taking breaks or resting mid job. he will continue to work even sacrificing their health or sleep.
traits.name: workaholic

traits.description: Timmy has never felt nausea in his life. Throwing up or food poisoning is foreign to him.
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy can't stand mistreatment of animals. he will feel happier being nuzzled or being a master to a bonded animal, but will be more deeply crushed when not master of a bonded animal or seeing one die. They also refuse to butcher.
traits.name: animallover

traits.description: Timmy believes deeply in human superiority. Killing animals will please them and the colony losing an animal is a cherry on top according to them.
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description: Whether because they're a bit chunky or because they shift their weight oddly, Timmy has broken a few chairs in their time and is likely to break more.
traits.name: big-boned

traits.description: Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.
traits.name: rebel

traits.description: Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.
traits.name: submissive

traits.description: Timmy is fueled by spite. They can't stand walking on the same soil as their rivals and will be elated by news of their life ending.
traits.name: vengeful

traits.description: Whether by past trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. They may randomly punch or attack mechanical devices and refuse to learn or research anything about them. They also love killing mechanoids.
traits.name: technophobe

traits.description: Timmy always recalls the good times and lives to party, any party attended will be remembered for many times longer than most.
traits.name: fun-loving

traits.description: Timmy has hindered mental capacities. While slow to learn and hard to speak with, they tend to be much happier naturally.
traits.name: dunce

traits.description: Timmy learned a specific move in melee combat which allows them to disarm opponents and will use it frequently.
traits.name: martialartist

traits.description: Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
traits.name: snob

traits.description: Sour stomach plagues Timmy any time they're around too much blood or rotting corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for him.
traits.name: squeamish

traits.description: Timmy feels naturally anxious, but especially from social situations. They will not attend any gatherings and may occasionally need alone time in their room to breathe.
traits.name: anxious

traits.description: No amount of lovin' is enough lovin' for Timmy. he will tend to jump from partner to partner and tumble between the sheets with them frequently.
traits.name: insatiable

traits.description: Timmy refuses to give their body to anybody but their spouse and would never fathom initiating a divorce. They also hate being nude much more than other pawns.
traits.name: prude

traits.description: An armchair and flatscreen is all Timmy needs to be happy. Even reruns or ancient commercials are entertaining to them, they will never grow bored of television and tend to watch it more, as well as feel pleased after doing so.
traits.name: couchpotato

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things feline. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with cats, however they're not a fan of dogs.
traits.name: catperson

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things canine. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with dogs, however they're not a fan of cats.
traits.name: dogperson

traits.description: Timmy is a natural scientist. They research much faster and recall things better. However, they'll be upset without a laboratory dedicated to their work and tend to stress out more frequently.
traits.name: prodigy

traits.description: Timmy believes animals are integral to the way society and life functions from furry friends to sources of food. They love having as many as possible and are particularly good at taming and training them.
traits.name: menagerist

traits.description: The sea calls to Timmy. he feels happier just being near the ocean or a deep river.
traits.name: oceanlover

traits.description: The mountains call to Timmy. he feels happier just being near a large mountain.
traits.name: mountainlover

traits.description: Timmy has a twisted secret. he treats organ harvesting like a sick experiment, and does not even blink at the idea. While harvesting one will make them happy, going too long without giving in to their compulsion will upset them.
traits.name: madsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. They claim to become more talented the more drunk they are.
traits.name: drunkenmaster

traits.description: Timmy is compulsed to steal and take things that don't belong to them, even if it means angering the other party.
traits.name: kleptomaniac

traits.description: Smokeleaf culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores smokeleaf and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: stoner

traits.description: Alcohol culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores booze and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: lush

traits.description: Timmy loves to travel and does so swiftly, but can grow upset if they haven't done so in a while. They are also quite adept at foraging while traveling.
traits.name: wanderlust

traits.description: Timmy is never really asleep or awake. he is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly, and will only sleep once every three days or so.
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description: Timmy has grown tired of the world and needs to be constantly distracted to stop dark thoughts. his bleak personality is a big downer and therefore it is very hard to become friends with them.
traits.name: worldweary

traits.description: Timmy is hardened through what can only be presumed as old emotional trauma. They feel absolutely nothing from lost animals, colonists, family, prisoners or dead bodies.
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description: Only the finest of culinary creations may grace the lips of Timmy. They feel neutral towards mundane meals, but will laud and savour lavish meals down to the last bite.
traits.name: refinedpalate

traits.description: Whether through studying ancient manuscripts or years of scholastic pursuit Timmy is surprisingly well read on a variety of topics, particularly science and medical practice.
traits.name: academian

traits.description: Timmy strongly believes infrastucture rules all and is a natural born stoneworker.
traits.name: groundbreaker

traits.description: In the eyes of Timmy food is art, their culinary creations are incredibly beautiful, amazing to taste, and almost always safe to eat.
traits.name: gastronomist

traits.description: Flora and fauna are both vital to Timmy. They use all parts of plants and animals and strongly appreciate mother Gaia's blessings.
traits.name: ecologist

traits.description: Timmy has an eye for silver and a tongue made from it. They believe their products are the best products and he will likely convince you if given the chance.
traits.name: tycoon

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
traits.name: thickskinned

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
traits.name: thinskinned

traits.description: Timmy has trouble expressing themselves until its all too much to bear, whereafter they will have an utter meltdown.
traits.name: schizoid

traits.description: Timmy has nimble hands and works at a rapid pace.
traits.name: fasthands

traits.description: Timmy has exceptional hand-eye coordination and can quickly put his sights on a target.
traits.name: crackshot

traits.description: Timmy is a talented marksman with a deadly aim.
traits.name: marksman

traits.description: Timmy is a natural born warrior and loves the thrill of fighting at close range.
traits.name: swordsman

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled builder, turning the most complicated plans into reality.
traits.name: foreman

traits.description: Timmy has an extensive knowledge of geology and uses that to his advantage.
traits.name: deepdriller

traits.description: Timmy handles ingredients with great care and prepares the most delicious meals.
traits.name: sous-chef

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled chemist and proficient in synthesizing drugs.
traits.name: pharmacist

traits.description: Timmy is a professional botanist and knows the peculiarities of most plants.
traits.name: botanist

traits.description: Timmy is a passionate farmer, loving the smell of fresh hay and the sight of grazing animals.
traits.name: rancher

traits.description: Timmy can move his hands with fine-grained precision.
traits.name: artisan

traits.description: Timmy sacrifices treatment quality to save as many lives as possible.
traits.name: fieldmedic

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled craftsman and knows how to handle various materials.
traits.name: smith

traits.description: Timmy is tactful in his social interactions and uses it to his advantage.
traits.name: socialworker

traits.description: Timmy has an extraordinary intellect accompanied with mental instability.
traits.name: naturalgenius

traits.description: Timmy maintains a clear state of mind and remains unfazed by the struggles of life.
traits.name: wise

traits.description: Timmy rarely stands out and is overlooked by almost everyone he meets.
traits.name: peasant

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description: A beautiful, semi-reptilian creature with features of a mythical dragon and a human being. They are prized by poachers for their silky, silver hair, and others seek to capture them for their high price at the black markets. Dragonian Race
races.name: Dragonian

races.description: A beautiful, semi-reptilian creature with features of a mythical dragon and a human being. They are prized by poachers for their silky, silver hair, and others seek to capture them for their high price at the black markets. Dragonian Race
races.name: Dragonian

races.description: A humanoid race living in cities under the sea. Having traits similar to sea creatures, their blood contains substances that can be used for various medical uses. Descendants of glitterworld explorers who settled in the deep sea, generations of body modifications has led to their current form. Spreading far and wide into the rim, they built many cities and prospered. Until now. Moyo-From the depth
races.name: Moyo

races.description: Inhabitants of lunar cities that carry the genes of rabbits, the rabbie excel at waging war and constructing mega-cities. They travel the galaxy in search of celestial bodies with planetarium; a drug that the rabbie population has been reliant on for survival since the begining of their history. It is believed they originally came from another galaxy, but have sinced lost the technology and have been cut off from their home galaxy. Rabbie The Moonrabbit race
races.name: Rabbie

races.description: The Blood Elves or Sin'dorei in Thalassian ("children of the blood"), are a race composed of former high elves who renamed themselves in honor of their people who were killed during the siege of Quel'Thalas by the Scourge during the Third War. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: blood elf

races.description: The draenei (meaning Exiled Ones in their own tongue) are a faction of uncorrupted eredar who fled their homeworld of Argus to escape the corruption of the demonic Burning Legion. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: Draenei

races.description: Dwarves are an ancient bold and courageous race descended from the earthen. Dwarves are short and stout creatures. They are shorter than humans but taller than gnomes, taking advantage of their size when possible and relying on their robustness and strength when not. The average dwarf is steady, observant and composed both during work and combat, yet able to rage with fierce zeal and persistence when the situation calls for it. While a dwarf prefers to plan forward to overcome challenges, many of them easily lose their temperament and self-restraint when exposed to conditions stirring their feelings and concerns. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: Dwarf

races.description: The undead Forsaken or simply the Forsaken and Undead are a race and a faction of intelligent undead who broke away from the Scourge and took control of much of the kingdom of Lordaeron, destroyed during the Third War by the death knight Arthas. While comprised vastly of undead humans, the Forsaken are a diverse faction that include several different races at their biological core. However, they have all assumed their racial identity as "Forsaken," due to their shared goals and loyalties. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: forsaken

races.description: The Night Elves are a powerful and mystical race whose origins extend back to ancient times. These then-immortal beings were among the first to study magic and let it loose throughout the world nearly ten thousand years before the First War on Azeroth. The far-reaching and ancient legacy of the night elves shaped them into a race of very self-sufficient and self-conscious individuals, who often display strong streaks of isolationism. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: Forsaken Night Elf

races.description: The Blood Elves or Sin'dorei in Thalassian ("children of the blood"), are a race composed of former high elves who renamed themselves in honor of their people who were killed during the siege of Quel'Thalas by the Scourge during the Third War. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: Forsaken High Elf

races.description: The gnomes (collectively referred to as gnomanity or gnomekind) are a race of diminutive and highly intelligent humanoids, known for their mastery of technology. They were originally descended from mechagnomes, metallic titan-forged, who were afflicted with the Curse of Flesh. Gnomes are a race of ambitious folk that celebrate creativity and craft and whose lives are validated by a masterful command of the scientific laws of the universe. This outlook on life makes them feel that to be pitied is unbearable, even insulting, though they know their allies do not do this intentionally. They have been more of a race of scholars throughout their history, generally focused on escaping and avoiding conflict, being also known to offset their lack of physical strength with ingenuity and daring. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: Gnome

races.description: The goblins (collectively known as goblinhood) are small green humanoids from the Isle of Kezan. Their love of money, explosives, and technology leaves them to be a very dangerous race, both to their enemies and themselves. Most goblins have a neutral standpoint, preferring to sell their contraptions, knowledge and services to other races. Goblins are slight and wiry, averaging 4 feet in height.[21][22][23] They have three fingers and one thumb on one hand and four toes on one foot. Their noses grow larger as they age. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: Goblin

races.description: The High Elves, or Quel'dorei ("children of noble birth"), are a race descended from the Highborne night elves who left Kalimdor and settled in the Eastern Kingdoms, founding Quel'Thalas. The high elves were once a significant force on the continent, but in recent times their numbers have been dramatically reduced: almost 90% of their population in Quel'Thalas was slaughtered during the Third War. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: high elf

races.description: Humans (collectively referred to as mankind or humanity) are a resilient species native to the world of Azeroth. Recent discoveries have shown that humans are descended from the barbaric half-giant vrykul of Northrend. Though humans are among the younger races on Azeroth, they have faced many challenges with fortitude and resilience. Their continued ability to adapt and rebuild has made them a vital force in an ever-changing world. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: azerothian human

races.description: The Night Elves are a powerful and mystical race whose origins extend back to ancient times. These then-immortal beings were among the first to study magic and let it loose throughout the world nearly ten thousand years before the First War on Azeroth. The far-reaching and ancient legacy of the night elves shaped them into a race of very self-sufficient and self-conscious individuals, who often display strong streaks of isolationism. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: night elf

races.description: The orcs are a race native to the world of Draenor, now known as Outland, they arrived to Azeroth through the Dark Portal a massive structure that allowed orcs passage from their world. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: Orc

races.description: The tauren (shu'halo in their native language of Taur-ahe) are a race of large, bovine humanoids who dwell on the great plains of Central Kalimdor. For countless generations, they were constantly harassed by the violent centaur, who forced the tauren into a nomadic lifestyle in the harsh Barrens. Despite their enormous size, the tauren are a peaceful and honorable people who nonetheless are fierce fighters when roused. Hunting and shamanism are held in high regard in their culture, as is their worship of the Earth Mother and respect for the land and nature. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: Tauren

races.description: Trolls (collectively referred to as trollkind) are a diverse sapient race that can be found in every part of Azeroth. They are one of the earliest known native races of Azeroth. Trolls are a species where multiple subspecies exist, these subspecies vary from being tall, lanky and muscular, with each subspecies being different than the others both physically and culturally. They have both elven and orc-like characteristics with their fierce tusks and long ears. Their long arms, strong legs, quick reflexes as well as their incredible agility and strength make them adept hunters. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: Troll

races.description: The worgen are a race of feral wolf-beasts whose very name inspires fear. They are large, lupine humanoids that walk upright, but lope on all fours to run. Being bitten by or drinking the blood of a worgen causes humans and night elves to be transformed into one. After the transformation, those that are overcome by rage and guilt gradually lose all vestiges of their former lives and turn mindless. By controlling their emotions via medication, magic, and self-discipline, worgen may resist being overcome by their feral instincts. (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: Worgen

races.description: Skeleton of the Scourge (Ry)Rimcraft
races.name: skeleton

races.description: A race of brutish aliens. RimRaces - Grodan Race
races.name: grodan

races.description: A race of above average intelligent aliens. RimRaces - Xotan Race
races.name: xotan

races.description: A race of crustacean-like aliens. RimRaces - Cruttun Race
races.name: cruttun

races.description: A tribe of rabbit-like humanoids. They are small and weak, but have powerful legs. Small bodies leave them roughly 15% weaker in nearly all respects Less resistant to cold temperatures Over 40% faster running speed Generally fine-featured and attractive Somewhat Neurotic Bun Race
races.name: Bun

races.description: A subspecies of the Moyo race, usually babies born after a Moyo is fertilized by a creature infected with the deep-sea virus. And because the symbiotic virus affects, most of them have strange personalities, but not intrinsically bad. Moyo-Light in the Abyss
races.name: Red Moyo

races.description: A race of amphibian-like aliens. RimRaces - Caerulean Race
races.name: caerulean

races.description: A weird being. Anthro Race
races.name: Anthro

races.description: They are bioweapons recreated after Mechanoids by the Anties. Dreadnaughts are possessed only the most advanced Hives and are stationed at the last lines of defense. They are equipped with low-angle intercepting systems. Unlike low-angle shields, they deny both incoming and outgoing projectiles.(Dlc) If the dreadnaughts are seen on the battlefront, it means child's play is over. Anty the war ant race
races.name: Anty Dreadnought

races.description: They are bioweapons recreated after Mechanoids by the Anties. \Hive guard are possessed only the most advanced Hives and are stationed at the last lines of defense. They are equipped with High-angle intercepting systems. Unlike High-angle shields, they deny both incoming and outgoing projectiles.(Dlc) If the Hive guard are seen on the battlefront, it means child's play is over. Anty the war ant race
races.name: Anty Hive guard

races.description: Anties are genetically engineered beings by a private company to replace dying soldiers on the battle field. Everything has gone south when the company has let their guard down to celebrate their recent progress. Due to a mistake made by one of the employees, the Anties have been set free from the lab and ended up in space. Their personalities are gentle by nature, but they were made to know only but war. On each planet they end up, they burn everything down to ash, using themselves as the main source of the fuel. Anty is hermaphrodite, has no externally exposed reproductive organs, but has both a scrotum and ovaries in the abdomen. Anty's gender is indicated based on her reproductive system, which was a little more developed prior to consuming the Nutritional jelly. The average height of common anty ergates and queen ants is 140cm, while soldier ants are 170cm. Depending on needs or the type of hive, it can transform or grow up to 200cm. Anty the war ant race
races.name: Anty

races.description: A race of humanlike robots which are mostly female in model variety. The origins of these machines are mostly unknown. Some speculate they are escapees from a civilization which used them for labor and some just suggest they are outdated pleasure machines which got dumped by a passing space freighter. By design by their previous masters they are weak physically but their raw fortitude is enough to make up for it. Beware of their biological reactor and capacitors violently exploding, if they die by overheating. Androids
races.name: Android

races.description: A race of rudimentary humanlike worker robots. Usually found toiling around in colonies around the rim which got a resident tinkerer. Not capable of sapience, however their relative cheap cost and ability to work around the clock make them valuable workers. Androids
races.name: Droid

races.description: A race of rudimentary humanlike warrior robots. Usually found guarding the homes of the wealthy and offices of mega corporations. They show no mercy upon targets who fail to identify themselves. Are traditionally armed with miniguns and core launchers. Androids
races.name: Battle droid

races.description: A race of blue demons hailing from the tribelands. Kolra's Oni Race Mod (Continued)
races.name: BlueOni

races.description: A race of green demons hailing from the forests. Kolra's Oni Race Mod (Continued)
races.name: GreenOni

races.description: A race of red demons hailing from the mountians. Living through hardship after hardship has resulted in these oni having stronger bodies than their smaller cousins. Having grown up residing in mountians has also had the benifit of making Red Oni exceptional miners. Kolra's Oni Race Mod (Continued)
races.name: RedOni

races.description: Arachne race lineage can be traced back to Arachne homeworld where the temperature fluctuate between cold and warm. Arachnes over thousands of generations began to adapt to these temperature and ables themselves to withstand cold but in return have less tolerance to the heat Arachne Race (Continued)
races.name: arachne

races.description: Long ago, a tribe of industrial zealots dabbled in an experimental technology that fused man and machine, giving rise to the Forgelings. A blend of steel and flesh, Forgelings consume chemfuel and wood to fuel a burning furnace within their chests. Pummeling metals into shape with their hammer-like fists, heating it with their burning forges, Forgelings make for excellent smiths. Forgelings race
races.name: forgeling

races.description: A gigantic creature that averages a height of 16 feet. Requires more food and has lower intellects, but the thick skin and sheer mass results in devastating strength. The GiantRace
races.name: Giant

races.description: Void elves (or ren'dorei, "children of the Void" in Thalassian) are a race of Void-infused elves affiliated with the Alliance. Their origins lie with a group of blood elves led by Magister Umbric who were exiled from Silvermoon City because of their research into the Void. They were transformed by void ethereals but rescued by Alleria Windrunner, who had gained mastery of the Void herself on Argus. Permanently transformed by the process, they pledged their loyalty to her and the Alliance and established themselves as the ren'dorei. The void elves seek to utilize their great but dangerous powers for the sake of defending Azeroth and the Alliance, and to prove those who doubt or judge their abilities wrong, all the while resisting the Void's call to madness. (Ry)Rimcraft Allied Races
races.name: void elf

races.description: The Mag'har orcs ("uncorrupted" in Orcish), also known as "brown orcs", are the orcs that escaped the corruption of the Burning Legion. On Draenor, they were a result of isolation from the Horde due to being quarantined in Garadar. They have a noble shamanistic tradition cultivating a mighty tribal society that was centered around survival, regulating themselves through ritualized combat and personal honor. (Ry)Rimcraft Allied Races
races.name: Mag'har Orc

races.description: The Nightborne or Shal'dorei in the native tongue, are a powerful and mystical race of elves who live in Suramar. Since the city was first separated from the rest of the world over 10,000 years ago, they are no longer true night elves and have evolved by the Nightwell into a unique elven species. For the majority of their secluded existence, virtually the entire group resided in the ancient city of Suramar and were led solely until recent times by Grand Magistrix Elisande. The nightborne race owes much of its unique physical characteristics to its long dependence on the Nightwell, an ancient source of power crafted by Suramar's Highborne residents during the War of the Ancients. Over their lengthy isolation, the exposure of the nightborne to the Nightwell's energies gradually transformed them from their original Kaldorei night elven appearance to their present darker, more night-based form. (Ry)Rimcraft Allied Races
races.name: nightborne

races.description: An extremely rare, unknown source of bioengineered species that possesses a human genome with additional patches, centaur is recognized as a distinct mammal species. Centaur has a stronger physique, better appearance, more adaptable to cold environments, larger appetite, stronger immunity, more difficult to be knocked down than humans, IMMUNE to pain shock, also a natural shooter. Despite their equine appearance, centaurs are omnivorous. According to myth, centaurs are archotech-created artificial species that immortal and invincible, but also infertility. They have extremely powerful race-exclusive equipment, made them a god-like exist - and none have ever spot or seen these gods. RimCentaurs
races.name: centaur
